alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 10:12PM CDT until April 30 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Concordia and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY, APRIL 23 TO SATURDAY, APRIL 30... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From Saturday, April 23 to Saturday, April 30. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 44.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday, April 23. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 44.4 Fri 8 pm CDT 44.8 45.3 45.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning around 915 AM CDT.
